name: UangMarket
description: UangMarket is the world's first one-stop chain game aggregation platformwith UANG as the core. It connects games, players and unions and establishes a rich GameFi ecosystem. UangMarket proposes the Steam concept of on-chain GameFi field and strive to build a GameFi aggregation service platform integrating games, information, skills and community. It aims to establish a rich GameFi ecosystem which can better promote the development of GameFi industry and realize the scenes and large-scale commercialization of games and NFT in the blockchain field.
